Watch Rapunzel’s golden hair glow and her whimsical spirit light up your screen through stunning animated scenes every time you open a new tab.

Features:
🌟 Live Wallpaper: Enjoy dynamic animations showcasing Rapunzel’s adventurous journey and glowing hair magic.

➕ Addable Shortcuts: Personalize your new tab by adding links to your most-visited sites.

Why Choose This Extension?
This extension is secure, lightweight, and respects your privacy. You can uninstall it at any time through the extension settings.

Explore more live wallpapers featuring Disney princesses, magical adventures, and fantasy landscapes. The menu also includes a note-taking tool, a privacy policy, and a simple uninstall option.
